articles.description: Arsenal manager Renee Slegers could barely believe what she had just witnessed as her side did the unthinkable and beat Barcelona to European glory.
articles.title: Women's Champions League: How Arsenal's comeback queens achieved the unthinkable

articles.description: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim says it would be a "mistake" not to hold a lap of honour after his side's final game of the season, when he plans to apologise to fans for a disappointing campaign.
articles.title: Manchester United: Ruben Amorim to apologise to fans after final Premier League game

articles.description: Lando Norris says his pole position at the Monaco Grand Prix is a "step in the right direction" and "quite a big thing" after being unhappy with his form since the start of this season.
articles.title: Monaco Grand Prix 2025: Norris pole position 'a big thing'

articles.description: Northampton's continental romance is ultimately ended by the grim realities of Bordeaux's power, but there is plenty of promise for the future
articles.title: Champions Cup: Brave Northampton beaten by Bordeaux's power

articles.description: Captain Ben Stokes says his comments about a potential immediate return to the England team for Jacob Bethell were "twisted to suit an agenda".
articles.title: Ben Stokes says Jacob Bethell comments were 'twisted to suit agenda'

articles.description: Paris St-Germain are one game away from completing the Treble after the Ligue 1 champions beat Reims to win the French Cup.
articles.title: PSG 3-0 Reims - Ligue 1 champions win French Cup to close in on Treble

articles.description: "There are discussions" over Cristiano Ronaldo playing at the Club World Cup despite his current club not qualifying, says Fifa president Gianni Infantino.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo 'could play' in 2025 Club World Cup, says Fifa president Gianni Infantino

articles.description: To mark Novak Djokovic's 100th title, BBC Sport delves deeper into the stories and numbers behind his ton of trophies.
articles.title: Novak Djokovic wins 100th ATP Tour title - the journey and stories behind his victories

articles.description: It might not have been pretty, but Aberdeen's long-awaited Scottish Cup final victory was one for raw emotion, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Scottish Cup final: 'Aberdeen savour the most perfect game ever played

articles.description: Chloe Kelly says she considered taking a break from football before Arsenal "put the smile back on my face" and transformed her difficult season "from a real low to a real high".
articles.title: Arsenal win Champions League: Chloe Kelly says club 'put a smile back on my face'
